description:
It`s swimming season at the junior high, and the frogs decide to pay the school a visit.  Natsumi`s out to beat the school year record... while Keroro`s out to beat Natsumi!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro vs Natsumi Suichuu Dai Kessen! de Arimasu / Fuyuki Youkoso Horror World e de Arimasu
Le grand duel aquatique / Histoires de fantômes
ケロロVS夏美水中大決戦! であります / 冬樹ようこそホラーワールドへ であります
